name: Death Slayer
description:
Death Slayer is a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer with frenetic action, the objective is to defeat all the enemies in the room in order to unlock access to the final boss of each level.

Immerse yourself in this adventure where you control Asura, a young swordswoman whose goal is to eradicate the evil that torments her lands.

Features:

· Wide variety of enemies and bosses, each with their own unique design and attack pattern.

· Different character moves that you will need to master in order to progress through the game.

· Intuitive controls that are easy to learn.

· Retro style level design and artwork that will take you back to the 90's.

· Excellent soundtrack that will immerse you in every level.
